scripts.build:lib: yarn install  &&  NODE_ENV=production  node build.mjs --onlyLib  &&  yarn run test
scripts.build:css: yarn install  &&  NODE_ENV=production  node build.mjs  &&  yarn run test &&  NODE_ENV=production yarn run gulp buildCss
scripts.build:css:dev: node build.mjs  &&  yarn run gulp buildCss
scripts.build:all: yarn run build:css  &&  NODE_ENV=production  yarn run gulp buildAssets
scripts.dev: yarn run -T concurrently -k "node build.mjs --dev"  "sleep 3 && yarn run gulp watch"  "yarn run dev:server" "yarn run test:dev"
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "
Run 'yarn run publishdist' to publish this package

"  && exit 1
scripts.publish:lib: yarn run build:lib  &&  cd _npm-lib  &&  npm publish
scripts.publish:server: yarn run publish:server:assets  &&  yarn run publish:server:css
scripts.publish:server:css: yarn run gulp publishDevCss  &&  NODE_ENV=production  yarn run gulp publishCss  &&  yarn run publish:server:release
scripts.test:dev: sleep 1  &&  (yarn run test || true)  &&  yarn run test:watch
scripts.test:watch: yarn run -T onchange '__tests/**/*.tests.js' -f add -f change -- yarn run -T ospec '{{file}}'
